wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Butler (born 7 February 1943) is a retired football right back best known for his spell at Swindon Town.

response: * Joe Butler (footballer, born 1943), English football defender for Newcastle United and Swindon Town
* Joe Butler (footballer, born 1879) (1879–1941), English goalkeeper for Stockport County, Clapton Orient, Glossop, Sunderland & Lincoln City
* Joe Butler (Joseph Campbell Butler, born 1941), musician, founding member of The Lovin' Spoonful
